verbs.description: nz activists [V: must] pay for lorde cancellation an israeli court has ordered two new zealand women to pay over 12 000 in damages for allegedly helping persuade the pop singer lorde to cancel a performance in israel the suit was filed under a law that allows civil lawsuits against anyone who calls for a boycott against israel wednesday ruling is believed to be the first time the 2011 law has been applied the two new zealanders justine sachs and nadia abu - shanab had appealed to the singer in an open letter to join the artistic boycott of israel lorde acknowledged the letter and canceled her show days later israel jerusalem nz nitsana darshan - leitner nitsana darshan leitner lorde justine sachs new zealand nadia abu - shanab nadia abu shanab
